titleStmt.title: A proclamation, containing His Majesties grace and favour to His Subjects [in t]his His ancient kingdom of Scotland
Proclamations. 1674-03-24
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Andrew Anderson, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Steele notation: Arms 232 Lo- jects twenty.
Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Holy-rood-house the twenty fourth day of March, 1674. And of Our Reign the twenty sixth year.
DFo copy, reel 2370, is creased and torn with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
